home.title: Building digital products, brands, and experiences
home.subtitle: I build responsive and performant web applications with modern technologies. Specialized in React, Node.js, and everything in between.

about.title: Here's a little about
about.description: I'm a passionate fullstack developer based in Grenoble, currently studying engineering at IMT Nord Europe while doing an apprenticeship. I love mixing creativity and logic to build elegant, user-friendly digital experiences. When I'm not coding or dreaming up new projects, you'll find me exploring the outdoors, jamming to music, or enjoying a good coffee. I'm always open and motivated to take on new external projects — so feel free to reach out!

fact1.title: Gym enthusiast
fact1.desc: At my prime, I had a 110kg bench

fact2.title: Amateur chess player
fact2.desc: I've been trying to learn chess recently

fact4.title: Runner enjoyer
fact4.desc: I did my first half marathon recently

timeline.title: Engineering Degree in Computer Science - IMT Nord Europe
timeline.subtitle: Villeneuve d'Ascq, France
timeline.description: Specializing in software engineering, focusing on full-stack development and system design. In apprenticeship at GIPSA-Lab.

timeline.title: FullStack Developer - GIPSA-Lab
timeline.subtitle: Grenoble, France
timeline.description: Developing and maintaining web applications, focusing on user experience and performance.

timeline.title: FullStack Developer - Laboratoire d'Informatique de Grenoble
timeline.subtitle: Grenoble, France
timeline.description: Created a web application from scratch to help doctorants manage their research projects.

timeline.title: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
timeline.subtitle: Grenoble, France
timeline.description: Focus on software development, algorithms, and data structures.

cards.title: Web Development
cards.description: Custom website development with focus on performance, SEO, and responsive design. From simple landing pages to complex web applications.

cards.title: Mobile App Development
cards.description: Native and cross-platform mobile app development for iOS and Android with focus on user experience and performance.

cards.title: UI/UX Design
cards.description: User-centered design solutions that enhance customer satisfaction and retention through intuitive and engaging interfaces.

bodies.typescript: The type system keeps my brain sane.
bodies.flutter: Write once, run anywhere. It's magic.
bodies.nextdotjs: Fullstack React never felt so good.
bodies.docker: Because it works on my machine™.
bodies.tailwindcss: Utility-first and fast. Never going back.
bodies.postgresql: Robust, reliable, and relational. My go-to DB.
bodies.mongodb: JSON all the way. Feels natural.
bodies.sqlite: Lightweight and handy for small stuff.
bodies.mariadb: A drop-in replacement with some cool extras.
bodies.neo4j: I don't even know what this is.
bodies.androidstudio: Heavy, but it gets the job done.
bodies.vscodium: Open source VS Code? Yes please.
bodies.notion: Docs, tasks, life planner — all in one.
bodies.redmine: Still surviving in some enterprise corners.

projects.title: My
projects.description: A selection of my recent work. Each project showcases different skills and technologies that I've acquired over the years.

project1.title: Achanfut
project1.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with EA accounts management, shopping cart, payment integration, and user authentication.

project2.title: MERN Boilerplate
project2.description: A boilerplate for building full-stack applications using the MERN stack, with auth, real-time status, admin panel, and more.

project3.title: Portfolio
project3.description: My personal portfolio showcasing my skills and projects.

project4.title: Paperlive
project4.description: A full-featured web application to help PhD students manage their research projects, developed for the Grenoble Computer Science Laboratory.

project5.title: YapNet
project5.description: A social media platform for sharing and discussing ideas, with features like posts, comments, and user profiles.

contact.title: Get in
contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to discuss potential opportunities? Feel free to reach out. I'm always open to new ideas and collaborations.
contact.success: Thank you! I will get back to you shortly.
contact.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

footer.tagline: Fullstack developer crafting beautiful and functional web experiences.
